# Address.IsGroupAddress method

Checks if an address is a [`GroupAddress`](../GroupAddress.md) or a [`IndividualAddress`](../IndividualAddress.md)

```csharp
public bool IsGroupAddress()
```

## Return Value

True in case of a [`GroupAddress`](../GroupAddress.md)
